dot-pmed_core_simple.Rd

Simple P_med Core Computation

Usage

.pmed_core_simple(
  a,
  b,
  c_prime,
  x_ref,
  x_value,
  sigma_y = 1,
  sigma_m = 1,
  n_sim = 10000
)
